Perceptor:

Perceptor leave the new base inside aq shuttle and  moved towar=
ds the old one.


OOC: he will arrive in my next post



  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Friday, November 02, 2007 8:40 PM
  Subject: Re: G2


  ::Jhiaxus/Scorponok=
::

  Jhiaxus smirks, knowing that the puppet is done. He moves back to the=
 computers to monitor the Atlantis base.

  Jhiaxus: Hydras, you might want=
 to check this out. Saying that the Maximal base is under attack is the und=
erstatement of the millinium. I'm reading Minions all over the base. So man=
y that it's hard to pick up Maximal signatures through them.

  Scorponok: =
It seems I have arrived at a busy time...

  Airshadow <airly2002@hotmail.c=
om> wrote:

    Hydras:

    "The we should take advantage quickly of curre=
nt situation, his base is under attack"said Hydras and soon he received an =
aencoded message from percepor "It seems that the puppet is done, Perceptor=
 is coming"






      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Richard A=
llen 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, November 01, =
2007 7:58 PM
      Subject: Re: G2


      ::Scorponok::

      Scorponok: =
I guess I came at a good time then. The thought of destroying Rodimus Prime=
... or Hot Rod... Whatever he calls himself. That foolish Targetmaster Auto=
bot was a pain in many of my plans so long ago.

      Airshadow <airly2002=
@...> wrote: 
        Hydras:

        Hydras hissed and said dryly=
 "gretings... now our chances to defeat Rodimus prime increases"


        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Richard Allen 
          To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2007 12:43 P=
M
          Subject: Re: G2


          ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Scorponok::

      =
    Jhiaxus: We'll use the puppet.

          Jhiaxus spins out of the chai=
r and stands up to greet the G2 newcomer.

          Outside the base the S=
corponok body transforms to a standing position with Zarak becoming the hea=
d. Scorponok walks into the base to eventually find Hydras and Jhiaxus.

  =
        Scorponok: Lord Jhiaxus, I am Scorponok; Headmaster warrior of the =
Generation 2 Decepticon Empire.

          Jhiaxus nods...

          OOC: =
Hydras should recognize Scorponok and know Zarak. And not like him I might =
ad.

          xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote: 
            Hy=
dras:

            Hydras typed some buttons and the doors opened he hissed=
 "tell them 
            that they can come in and I have more info bout th=
is bot"

            A winged bot pictures, his wings were dull black hue. =
His body was 
            a deep black with dull red highlights. 

        =
    "Jsut we have to wait that perceptor send us the puppet... unless 
    =
        you want to do this personally..." said devilish Hydras

          =
